info.title: IMN Merchant API  - DEV
info.description:
# The REST API of IMN system
## Overview
The REST APIs provide programmatic access to read and write IMN data. 
Basically, with this API you will be able to do everything like you were with your browser on https://go.imn.io !

The main features are:
- Register and manage your merchant account
- Declare your source marketplace to get your offers
- Configure your marketplace api credential
- Define the target marketplaces you want to go to, then you will be able to configure:
	- the pricing setting 
	- the shipping settings
- ...and more!


## Things to keep in mind
### API Rate Limits
- The IMN REST API is limited to 100 calls/minute.

### Media type
The default media type for requests and responses is application/json. Where noted, some operations support other content types. If no additional content type is mentioned for a specific operation, then the media type is application/json.

### Required content type
The required and default encoding for the request and responses is UTF8.

### Required date time format
All our date time are formatted in ISO 8601 format: 2014-06-24T16:25:00Z.

### Base URL
The Base URL of the IMN API Order Management REST API conforms to the following template.

https://api.imn.io

All URLs returned by the IMN API are relative to this base URL, and all requests to the REST API must use this base URL template.

You can test our API on https://api-docs.imn.io/swagger-ui
You can contact us on [gitter, #IMN/API](https://gitter.im/IMN/API)

303.description:
The operation is completed so the resource is up to date now! 
For more information, please read this: https://www.adayinthelifeof.nl/2011/06/02/asynchronous-operations-in-rest/

head.summary: Get the meta information about the order (ETag, Last-Modified)
head.description:
This operation use our redis cache to give you the most performant response.
The purpose of this operation is to reduce the bandwith usage by getting just the meta information about the order (ETag, Last-Modified) with the body.

200.description: Successfully fetched Order and Order Item(s) properties

Last-Modified.description:
Last modification UTC date of the order\
For more details go to this link: https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc7232#section-2.2

ETag.description:
ETag value to identify the current version of requested Order\
For more details go to this link: http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc7232#section-2.3

post.description: This operation should be called to temporarily resolve a synchronization issue between the marketplace an IMN

202.description: The reharvest order request has been accepted

post.summary: Reharvest orders
post.description: This operation should be called to temporarily resolve a synchronization issue between the marketplace an IMN. This operation will automatically push to IMN the orders related to a merchant since

parameters.name: since
parameters.description: If implemented, will allow IMN to indicate since which order purchase utc date we will like to be synchronized. Default is 30 days ago.

parameters.name: until
parameters.description: If implemented, will allow IMN to indicate until which order purchase utc date we will like to be synchronized. Default is utcnow

202.description: The reharvest orders request has been accepted

cultureName.description: If the error is translated, the culture name will be indicated

marketplaces.description: The key is the marketplace code

offersPublicationStatus.description: The status of the offer publication to the target marketplace

publishableOfferCount.description: The publishable offer count for this target marketplace (considering the product matching)

pushedOfferCount.description: The pushed offer count to this target marketplace

pushedOfferCountLastSynchronizationUtcDa.description: The push offer count last synchronization to the target marketplace

publishedOfferCount.description: The published offer count to this target marketplace - PREVIEW

lastPublicationUtcDate.description: The last synchronization of the offers from the target marketplace - PREVIEW

ordersImportationStatus.description: The status of the order importation from the marketplace

lastSynchronizationUtcDate.description: The last synchronization of the orders from the marketplace

importedOrderCount.description: The imported order count from the marketplace

offersSourceStatus.description: The status of the offer importation from the source marketplace

lastSynchronizationUtcDate.description: The last synchronization of the offers from the source marketplace

importedOfferCount.description: The imported offer count from the source marketplace

marketplaceApiCredential.description: The API credentials of the merchant on his marketplace.

marketplaceCode.description:
The marketplace code identifier in IMN.
For now we have:
- C1 for Cdiscount
- E1 for ePrice
- R1 for Real.DE
- B1 for BOL
- E2 for eMAG

charge.description: The charge for this delivery mode considering the rule

additionalCharge.description: The additional charge for this delivery mode

LOVLink3.description: Describe the way you have to follow to get access to the LOV

href.description: Indicate the uri to the list of value

sku.description: The Stock Keeping Unit (SKU), i.e. a merchant-specific identifier for a product or service, or the product to which the offer refers. http://schema.org/sku

gtin.description:
Global Trade Item Number (GTIN) of the item.
Supported values:

- UPC (in North America / GTIN-12)
12-digit number like 323456789012
8-digit UPC-E codes should be converted to 12-digit codes
- EAN (in Europe / GTIN-13)
13-digit number like 3001234567892
- JAN (in Japan / GTIN-13)
8 or 13-digit number like 49123456 or 4901234567894
- ISBN (for books)
10 or 13-digit number like 1455582344 or 978-1455582341. If you have both, only include the 13-digit number. ISBN-10 are deprecated and should be converted to ISBN-13
- ITF-14 (for multipacks / GTIN-14)
14-digit number like 10856435001702

Schema.org property:
- [Offer.gtin8](http://schema.org/gtin8)
- [Offer.gtin12](http://schema.org/gtin12)
- [Offer.gtin13](http://schema.org/gtin13)
- [Offer.gtin14](http://schema.org/gtin14)
- [Offer.isbn](http://schema.org/isbn)

deliveryMethod.description: A delivery method is a standardized procedure for transferring the product or service to the destination of fulfillment chosen by the customer. Delivery methods are characterized by the means of transportation used, and by the organization or group that is the contracting party for the sending organization or person.

httpMethod.description: Indicate the http method to use on this link

source.description: If true, this marketplace is the source of offers

not.description: if true, then the operator will be inverted. Default is false.

label.description: The label corresponding to the link. This label is automatically translated based on the Accept-Language http header.

urlTemplated.description: indicates whether the href is templated or not

allRequiredParamsProvided.description: indicates whether all required params have been provided

allOptionalParamsProvided.description: indicates whether all optionals params have been provided

href.description: Indicate the relative uri for this link

label.description: The label corresponding to the link parameter. This label is automatically translated based on the Accept-Language http header.

value.description: The value of the parameter. It can be an integer a string or an object.

lovRequired.description: If true, you MUST indicate a value from the list of values otherwise it's a freetext

properties.description: If the parameter is an object with flexible properties (additionProperties/dictionary), we will describe the properties of the object.

parameterIn.description:
* path: if the parameter must be pass in the path uri
* header: if the parameter must be passed in http header
* query: if the parameter must be passed in querystring
* body: if the parameter must be passed in the body
* file: if the parameter must be passed in a multipart/form-data (https://swagger.io/docs/specification/2-0/file-upload/)

validationPattern.description: The regular expression to validate the value

label.description: The label corresponding to the link parameter property. This label is automatically translated based on the Accept-Language http header.

value.description: The value of the parameter. It can be an integer a string or an object.

lovRequired.description: If true, you MUST use indicate a value from the list of values otherwise it's a freetext

parameterType.description: The value type of the parameter

merchantAccountIndexLinks.description:
The action you can do on the account API
The create and checkMerchantCode link will be available when the merchant code is not created
The account link will be available when the merchant has be created

apiToken.description: The api token that you will have to use to connect to our API

importedOfferCount.description: Imported offer count from the source marketplace or from his shop system source

merchantAccountInfoLinks.description:
The action you can do on a merchant.
The external link will be avaible if there is no subscription requested

allOf.description:
The link to sales force form to easily subscribe to the marketplaces
The query string will be indicated by the server:
- email: the email of the merchant
- merchantCode: The merchant code
- hmac: Computed by the server with a shared secret key

merchantCode.description: The merchant code identifier in IMN

ecommerceSoftwareName.description: The e-commerce software name of the merchant

lateToShip.description: The order count late to ship

beginPeriodUtcDate.description: The begin date of the period for the report

endPeriodUtcDate.description: The end date of the period for the report. Period max: 360 days

beginPeriodUtcDate.description: The begin date of the period for the report

endPeriodUtcDate.description: The end date of the period for the report. Period max: 360 days

orderLinks.description:
The links related to an order.
The "go" property is the link to see the order on https://go.imn.io
Example: TBD

orderIndex.description: Describe in details all informations related to an order.

orderTransitionLinks.description: Contains the authorized change actions for an order

orderApiIndexLinks.description: Gives you all entry point operations you can do on this API

orderListFullLinks.description: The list of actions you can do from the order list response

orderListLightLinks.description: The list of actions you can do from the order list response

orderListFull.description:
The order list with all information we have from the orders and its items.\
The paginationResult properties can be null if the list is empty.

fullInfoNotSynchronized.description: The order index list light in case there is some issue during the synchronization of the full info. This list should be empty or null most of the time. It has been developed for sanity check and explain the order count which is based on the order light info.

orders.description: The order index list, this list can be empty if there is no result

orderListLight.description:
The order list with all information we have from the orders and its items.\
The paginationResult properties can be null if the list is empty.

orders.description: The order index list, this list can be empty if there is no result

orderHistory.description: Describe the history related to an order

synchronizationReportings.description: The list of order synchronization operation

changeOrderReportings.description: The list of change order operation

orderSynchronizationReporting.description: The reporting related to a order synchronization operation

changeOrderReporting.description: The reporting related to a change order operation

creationUtcDate.description: The creation UTC date of the execution

lastUpdateUtcDate.description: The last update UTC date of the execution

sourceUserIPAddress.description: The IP address who request this operation

shipOrderWithTrackingUrlRequest.description: The ship order parameters for an unidentified carrier in the carrierCode enum

batchOrderOperationResponse.description: The response given by the batch operation

orderOperationResponse.description: The response given by the batch operation for an order

success.description: Indicates if the operation succeed or not

status.description: Indicates the http status corresponding to the individual operation

subscriptionName.description: The subscription name you want to use

beginPeriodUtcDate.description:
The begin period you want to make the search. \
The period MUST not be greater than 90 days.
The begin period MUST be lower than the end period.

endPeriodUtcDate.description:
The end period of you search. \
The period MUST not be greater than 90 days. \
The end period MUST be greater than the begin period.
The end period MUST be lower to the current date.

shipmentStatus.description:
Looking for late orders
* all: All orders without considering the shipment status
* lateToShip: Orders with the latestShipmentDate is passed
* toShip: Orders to ship

imnOrderStatus.description: IMN order status. Unified for all marketplaces.

orderDateSearchType.description: Indicates on which date you want to make the filter

firstName.description: The first name of a person

lastName.description: The last name of a person

pageSize.description: Indicate the item count per page

orderListSort.description: Indicates how you want to sort the order list

merchantECommerceSoftwareVersion.description: The e-commece software version of the merchant

correlationId.description: The correlation identifier. It's a guid.

orderListSortBy.description: Indicates on which property you want to sort the order list

orderListSortOption.description: Indicates if you want to sort ascending or descending order

purchaseUtcDate.description: The purchase date of this order

marketplaceLastModificationUtcDate.description: The last modification UTC date done by the marketplace on this order

imnLastModificationUtcDate.description: The last modification UTC date done by IMN of this order

marketplaceChannel.description: Useful to identify the origin of the order. For example in Cdiscount.

totalPrice.description: The total price of this order (corresponding to the amount paid by the customer)

earliestShipUtcDate.description: The UTC date of the earliest ship for this order

latestShipUtcDate.description: The UTC date of the latest ship for this order

allOf.description: Describe in details all informations related to an order.

orderEtag.description:
ETag value to identify the order.\
This information is required for the operation GetOrder and ChangeOrder.\
For more details go to this link: http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc7232#section-2.3

messageId.description: The message identifier. It's a guid.

operationSourceType.description:
Indicates the origin of the operation:
* api: the operation has been done using our api directly.
* ui: the operation has been done using our user interface.

processingStatus.description: The processing status of an operation

orderMarketplaceInfo.description: Describe the basic information related to an order.

orderMerchantInfo.description: The information that concerns the merchant for this order

orderIMNInfo.description: The current order change correlation identifier indicates you if there is a pending order change on the marketplace side.

imnLastModificationUtcDate.description: The last modification UTC date done by IMN of this order

trackingNumber.description: The shipper tracking number related to the shipping

carrierCode.description:
The carrier code related to the shipping
* DeutschePost: DeutschePost
* DHL: DHL
* GLS: GLS
* TNT: TNT
* UPS: UPS
* DPD: DPD
* FEDEX: FEDEX
* 4PX: 4PX
* Bpost: Bpost
* ChinaEMSePacket: China EMS (ePacket)
* ChinaPost: China Post
* Chronopost: Chronopost

carrierName.description: The carrier name related to the shipping

trackingUrl.description: The tracking url related to the shipping

refundReason.description: The reason why you refund the order

cancellationReason.description: The reason why you cancel the order

purchaseUtcDate.description: The purchase date of this order

marketplaceLastModificationUtcDate.description: The last modification UTC date done by the marketplace on this order

marketplaceChannel.description: Useful to identify the origin of the order. For example in Cdiscount.

comment.description: The comment associated to this order

totalPrice.description: The total price of this order (corresponding to the amount paid by the customer)

totalTax.description: The total tax of this order

totalCommission.description: The total commission of this order

additionalFee.description: Additional fee related to this order

paymentMethod.description: The payment method of this order

payingUtcDate.description: The UTC date of the payment of this order

orderBillingInfo.description: The billing information related to the order

orderShippingInfo.description: The shipping information related to the order

relayId.description: The company name of The address for this order

price.description: The shipping price of this order

method.description: The shipping method of this order

tax.description: The shipping tax for this order

earliestShipUtcDate.description: The UTC date of the earliest ship for this order

latestShipUtcDate.description: The UTC date of the latest ship for this order

orderItems.description: The key correspond to the order item identifier. Must be unique.

customerIdentifier.description: The buyer identifier for this order

comment.description: The comment to access to this address

countryIsoCodeAlpha2.description: The address country iso code alpha 2 (see http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2#/decoding_table for more details)

companyName.description: The company name of the person

id.description: The order item identifier. Must be unique in the order.

title.description: The title of the order item

condition.description: The condition of the order item

marketplaceProductId.description: The marketplace product identifier of the order item

itemPrice.description: The price of the order item

itemTax.description: The tax of the order item

quantity.description: The quantity of the order item

shippingPrice.description: The shipping price of the order item

totalPrice.description: The total price of the order item

allOf.description: The defaultDeliveryMethod is required if the deliverySpecifications is fulfilled

paginationContinuationToken.description: Just a string value that will help to get the next page

allOf.description: The defaultDeliveryMethod is required if the deliverySpecifications is fulfilled

etag.description: The new etag based on the offer information

deliverySpecificationEdition.description: Define the pricing for the delivery method if not specify default will be used

offer.description: The defaultDeliveryMethod is required if the deliverySpecifications is fulfilled

price.description: The offer price of a product, or of a price component when attached to PriceSpecification and its subtypes. http://schema.org/price

inventoryLevel.description: The current approximate inventory level for the item or items. http://schema.org/inventoryLevel

merchantOfferUnpublicationReasonCode.description: The reason of the unpublication of an offer

fulfilledBy.description: The marketplace in charge of the delivery on this offer.

priceCurrency.description:
The offer price of a product, or of a price component when attached to PriceSpecification and its subtypes.
Usage guidelines:
Use the priceCurrency property (with ISO 4217 codes e.g. USD) instead of including ambiguous symbols such as $ in the value. http://schema.org/priceCurrency

minPrice.description: The lowest price if the price is a range. http://schema.org/minPrice

deliveryLeadTime.description: The typical delay between the receipt of the order and the goods either leaving the warehouse or being prepared for pickup, in case the delivery method is on site pickup. http://schema.org/deliveryLeadTime

deliverySpecification.description: Define the pricing for the delivery method if not specify default will be used

validFrom.description: The date when the item becomes valid. http://schema.org/validFrom

validThrough.description: The date after when the item is not valid. For example the end of an offer, salary period, or a period of opening hours. http://schema.org/validThrough

userLovLinks.description: List of lov link. The key is the list name.

listOfValueItem.description: This object is used by LOV apis

additionalInformation.description: Please provide the technical explanation here
Please provide the technical explanation here
Please provide the technical explanation here
Please provide the technical explanation here

ifNoneMatchParameter.name: If-None-Match
ifNoneMatchParameter.description:
ETag value to identify the last known version of requested resource.\
To avoid useless exchange, we recommend you to indicate the ETag you previously got from this operation.\
If the ETag value does not match the response will be 200 to give you a new content, otherwise the response will be: 304 Not Modified, without any content.\
For more details go to this link: http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc7232#section-2.3

userNameInQueryParameter.name: userName
userNameInQueryParameter.description: Optional. Sometimes the user in the e-commerce application is not the same as user associated with the current subscription key. We recommend providing your application's user login.

testModeInQueryParameter.name: testMode
testModeInQueryParameter.description: If true, the operation will be not be sent to marketplace. But the validation will be taken in account.

ifMatchParameter.name: If-Match
ifMatchParameter.description:
ETag value to identify the last known version of requested resource.\
To ensure that you are making a change on the lastest version of the resource.\
For more details go to this link: http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc7232#section-2.3

correlationIdParameter.name: correlationId
correlationIdParameter.description: It's the guid corresponding to the operation.

beginPeriodUtcDateInQueryParameter.name: beginPeriodUtcDate
beginPeriodUtcDateInQueryParameter.description: The begin date of the period for the report

endPeriodUtcDateInQueryParameter.name: endPeriodUtcDate
endPeriodUtcDateInQueryParameter.description: The end date of the period for the report. Period max: 360 days

skuListQueryOptionalParameter.name: skus
skuListQueryOptionalParameter.description:
Collection format: csv
The Stock Keeping Unit (SKU), i.e. a merchant-specific identifier for a product or service, or the product to which the offer refers. http://schema.org/sku

gtinListQueryOptionalParameter.name: gtins
gtinListQueryOptionalParameter.description:
Collection format: csv

Global Trade Item Number (GTIN) of the item.
Supported values:

- UPC (in North America / GTIN-12)
12-digit number like 323456789012
8-digit UPC-E codes should be converted to 12-digit codes
- EAN (in Europe / GTIN-13)
13-digit number like 3001234567892
- JAN (in Japan / GTIN-13)
8 or 13-digit number like 49123456 or 4901234567894
- ISBN (for books)
10 or 13-digit number like 1455582344 or 978-1455582341. If you have both, only include the 13-digit number. ISBN-10 are deprecated and should be converted to ISBN-13
- ITF-14 (for multipacks / GTIN-14)
14-digit number like 10856435001702

Schema.org property:
- [Offer.gtin8](http://schema.org/gtin8)
- [Offer.gtin12](http://schema.org/gtin12)
- [Offer.gtin13](http://schema.org/gtin13)
- [Offer.gtin14](http://schema.org/gtin14)
- [Offer.isbn](http://schema.org/isbn)

pageSizeQueryStringOptinalParameter.name: pageSize
pageSizeQueryStringOptinalParameter.description: The entry count you want to get

paginationContinuationTokenHeaderOptiona.name: X-ContinuationToken
paginationContinuationTokenHeaderOptiona.description: The pagination continuation token you want to get next page.

skuPathParameter.name: sku
skuPathParameter.description: The Stock Keeping Unit (SKU), i.e. a merchant-specific identifier for a product or service, or the product to which the offer refers. http://schema.org/sku

paginationContinuationTokenQueryStringPa.name: paginationContinuationToken
paginationContinuationTokenQueryStringPa.description: The pagination continuation token you want to get next page.

pageNumberQueryStringOptinalParameter.name: pageNumber
pageNumberQueryStringOptinalParameter.description: The page number you want to get

acceptLanguageParameter.name: Accept-Language
acceptLanguageParameter.description: Indicates that the client accepts the following languages.

merchantOrMarketplaceNotFound.description: The merchant code or marketplace code is not found.

invalidMerchantCode.description: The merchant code is different from the state

merchantNotFound.description: The merchant code is not found.

notOfferSourceMarketplace.description: The marketplace is not the offer source

subscriptionNotAccepted.description: The subscription is not accepted by the marketplace

credentialNotConfigured.description: The credential is not configured for the marketplace

merchantCodeAlreadyUsed.description: The merchant code is not available

orderMerchantInfoBatchOperationResponse.description:
Succesfully or partially processed operations.
In the response, you will see the status per operation.

Location.description: The location to monitor the progression of the operation in the IMN system

orderChangeBatchOperationResponse.description:
Succesfully or partially processed operations.
In the response, you will see the status per operation.

For each operation succeed:
- the operation will be fowarded to the marketplace
- that does not mean that marketplace will validate your operation.

Location.description: The location to monitor the progression of the operation in the IMN system

304_NotModified.description: The ETag sent in the http header If-None-Match did not change. So you are up to date !

Last-Modified.description:
Last modification UTC date of the resource\
For more details go to this link: https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc7232#section-2.2

ETag.description:
ETag value to identify the current version of the resource\
For more details go to this link: http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc7232#section-2.3

orderBatchBadRequest.description:
In case there is an error like:
- ValidationException
- DuplicateOrderOperationException
- InvalidMerchantCodeException
- OrderManagementDisabledException

orderNotFound.description: The requested order is not found.

412_PreConditionFailed.description: The ETag sent in the http header If-Match did not match with the current version. Please refresh the information related to this resource.

ETag.description:
The ETag value to identify the resource.\
For more details go to this link: http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc7232#section-2.3

orderChangeAlreadyInProgress.description:
Already processing a change request for this Order.\
Please refresh your clients Order information and retry later.

Retry-After.description: Indicates the duration in seconds to wait to be able to make this request again

orderChangeNotFound.description: The requested order or correlation identifier is not found.

429_TooManyRequests.description: Occurs when the server received too many requests

Retry-After.description: indicates the remaining time until the server will accept new requests. For more details, please follow this link https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc7231#section-7.1.3

offerBatchBadRequest.description:
In case there is an error like:
- ValidationException
- DuplicateMerchantOfferOperationException
- DuplicateMerchantMarketplaceOfferOperationException
- InvalidMarketplaceCodeException
- InvalidMerchantCodeException
